channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cooked Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cooked Pro

item.title: CVE-2022-3900|2024-08-03T01:20:58.476Z -- unknown -- cooked%20pro
item.description: The Cooked Pro WordPress plugin before 1.7.5.7 does not properly validate or sanitize the recipe_args parameter before unserializing it in the cooked_loadmore action, allowing an unauthenticated attacker to trigger a PHP Object injection vulnerability.
